text: For analysis of <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression at the single-cell level , cells were first stained with the monoclonal antibody <extra_id_0> CD25 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( Beckman Coulter ) , and after fixation and permeabilization , cells were incubated with PE-conjugated monoclonal antibody PCH101 ( anti-human <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ; eBioscience ) based on the manufacturer 's recommendations and subjected to FACS ( EPICS XL-MCL ) .

For cell surface marker staining , cells were incubated for 20 min at 4degreesC in staining buffer with the following antibodies : anti - <extra_id_0> CD152 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - PE ( CTLA-4 ; BD ) , anti - <extra_id_0> PD-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( eBiosciences ) , anti - <extra_id_0> GITR <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( R & D Systems ) , anti - <extra_id_0> CD69 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( Beckman Coulter ) , anti - <extra_id_0> CD103 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( DakoCytomation ) , anti - <extra_id_0> CD62L <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( Beckman Coulter ) , or anti-HLA-DR ( Beckman Coulter ) .
The controls were FITC , PE , or ECD-conjugated mouse IgG1 or rat IgG2a .

For staining of mouse cells , the following mAbs from BD Biosciences were used following standard techniques as described above : anti - <extra_id_0> CD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , anti - <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and anti - <extra_id_0> CD25 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
Anti-FcgammaRII / III antibody ( 2.4G2 , ATCC ) was included in all stainings to reduce nonspecific antibody binding .

To isolate naive murine <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> T cells from murine DO11.10 or DO11.10x <extra_id_0> CD2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> T cells , cells were stained with anti - <extra_id_0> CD25 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - FITC , anti - <extra_id_0> CD62L <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - PE , and anti - <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - APC prior to sorting .
Dead cells were excluded with 4'' , 6-Diamidino-2-phenylindole ( DAPI ) .

To analyze murine <extra_id_0> Foxp3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression in inducible Treg cultures , cells were stained intracellularly with anti - <extra_id_0> Foxp3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - PE according to manufacturer 's instruction , in conjunction with anti - <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - APC and LIVE / DEAD fixable dead cell stain kit ( Invitrogen ) to discriminate live cells .
All monoclonal antibodies for murine cell stainings were purchased from eBioscience or BD Biosciences .
